when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"creditLine(address)":{"params":{"debtor":"Address of the account to get the credit line for"},"returns":{"_0":"_ Credit line of the account If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. UkzMxMT9D1c2JDy8ttNjYjQ1eYAD63"]},"src/interfaces/IPermission.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd9cf3a29c16e192f2f265396870cb93cf91c91bbe62cb9a1ed343c32b4052f48","license":"GPL-2.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://48e25c7560455ffda43cbfb37ee47ed4da9c6bd38e46bcfd5fe4e982d5c34eaf","dweb:/ipfs/Qmco16L9EdpXGFJXn7mdgkCpKErYRB4HFUzYB5m5yUnZcz"]},"src/utils/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe05013f20310c9cefa762bcbb06e8850abb43aaa54dce955e90c20943b70dd3a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bb9355c6aa4b5fa1f26b381e49c3cc61e12e7c3e3b3476485a32e06cede4bcf8","dweb:/ipfs/QmQPEfrYSub7Y4U1XHXi5YPq2zuCZjWcRX1AeG7dCHGsfU"]},"src/utils/Permission.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1e7c3aa37a4acb7783e85c7d292c7ef4c561b4024e011970cc5da2ed3bc228c1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://58b785fcc15ce8d2f58bff13c023061caa19ff0c14f74d8bc27299a78e575fbb","dweb:/ipfs/QmXr2JRVjTaW34zEAAu7FuXmwgP9AYgreraMrGEoJYj69p"]}},"version":1}

params.debtor: Address of the account to get the credit line for

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

modifyBalance(address,address,uint256).details: Sender has to have the permit of `from` to call this method

params.from: Address of the account to transfer credit from
params.to: Address of the account to transfer credit to

params.caller: Address of the caller to grant or revoke permission for
params.permitted: Whether to grant or revoke permission

params.caller: Address of the caller to grant or revoke permission for
params.permitted: Whether to grant or revoke permission

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setParameter(address,bytes32,uint256).details: Sender has to be allowed to call this method

params.data: New value to set for the variable [wad]
params.parameter: Name of the variable to set

setParameter(bytes32,uint256).details: Sender has to be allowed to call this method

params.data: New value to set for the variable [wad]
params.parameter: Name of the variable to set

params.agent: Address of the agent to grant or revoke permission for
params.permitted: Whether to grant or revoke permission

accounts(address).notice: Map of accounts with their own balance (+ credit, - debt) and debt ceiling

creditLine(address).notice: Returns the current amount of debt (<> credit) an account can generate (<> draw)

globalDebt().notice: Total amount of debt generated <> credit issued by the cdm [wad]

globalDebtCeiling().notice: Total amount of debt that can be generated / credit that can be issued by the cdm [wad]

hasPermission(address,address).notice: Checks if `caller` has the permission to perform an action on behalf of `owner`

modifyBalance(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers credit from one account to another. If the `from` account's positive balance (credit) isn't sufficient to cover the transfer, its balance can go negative (debt) up to the debt ceiling.

modifyPermission(address,address,bool).notice: Gives or revokes the permission for `caller` to perform an action on behalf of `owner`

modifyPermission(address,bool).notice: Gives or revokes the permission for `caller` to perform an action on behalf of `msg.sender`

setParameter(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Sets various variables for this contract

setParameter(bytes32,uint256).notice: Sets various variables for this contract

setPermissionAgent(address,bool).notice: Gives or revokes the permission for the `agent` to modify the permissions of `msg.sender`

documentation.text: @notice Total amount of debt generated <> credit issued by the cdm [wad]
@notice Total amount of debt that can be generated / credit that can be issued by the cdm [wad]
@notice Map of accounts with their own balance (+ credit, - debt) and debt ceiling

@title CDM
 @notice Global accounting for credit and debt in the system
